post.body: you betcha! so - i just opened up a bag-a costa ricans (not to be confused with puerto ricans ... ) good stuff!
hey roaster - you ROCK!! thanks for helping me wake up EVERY MORNING!!! ;
preach it, master roaster!!
you should cover that in your pro photo show podcast/blog sometime - it'd be a good, helpful topic
not yet .. and maybe not for a bit --2much camera gear to buy. have fun w'it, tho! (and make sure jason shares w'the other boys
hey - put down the controller, and check your msgs on facebook! ;)
sacrilege, i tell you... my ears hurt
sorry - i didn't get to it tonight. maybe tomorrow - keep checkin' in ;)
maybe so -- i guess ALL the picks weren't his fault, but he certainly wasn't mr clean... i'm just frustrated, i guess.
preach it, my brotha -- miserable, miserable showing -- "hey andy - take a hike, and take d-mac with ya!"
hey - what about me? :(
yep - either i can get it for you, or you can order online/some local stores. check here - www.onevillagecoffee.com
nice - post pix on facebook - i wanna see!
and i go in there pretty frequently - what can i say, i tend to be a lazy coffee drinker in the evening
i know - and i rave about you to jesse and heidi EVERY SINGLE TIME I GO IN THERE!! (b/c you ARE the BEST!!)
so - which is it that you're getting paid for? ;)
awe - me, too! a sick woody makes me sad!
tx for sharing your love for the bean .. you make the world a better place, my friend (your smile, laugh, and big mits help, too!)
lightroom 2 is DEFINITELY worth the upgrade .. i've been enjoying digging in and finding GOLD!
enjoying a day "kik'n back w' the fam" after a long, but great, day yesterday at the chris & krista's wedding - shots up on blog soon!
http://twitpic.com/n005 - joy - gotta love it!
enjoying a cuppa main st java - next best thing to one village coffee -
also been enjoying gorging my mind on photo podcasts .. twip, pro photo show, camera dojo -- GREAT stuff, you guys!
retiring for the evening - after tiring over waiting for my silly slow computer... g'nite!
